decision_conditions: The proposed plans indicate amendments which would result in an increase in the built form and a change in the design and appearance of the development. The proposed changes cannot be considered as non-material as they represent a form of development beyond the scope of the planning approval. The potential impacts therefore need to be considered as part of a new planning application.
description: Non-material amendment to planning permission ref. 33285/APP/2023/2784, dated 16-11-2023 (Demolition of garage, outbuilding, passageway, rear and front porch. Reconstruction of roof profile and conversion of roof space to habitable use to include front and rear dormers. Erection of a single storey side extension set under new roof. Erection of a single storey rear extension.) to add a flat roof dormer between the two rear dormers and raise the ridgeline.
